title: [Effect of governor vessel moxibustion on cardiopulmonary fitness in stable chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with
abstract: To observe the effect of governor vessel moxibustion on improving cardiopulmonary fitness in patients with stable chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) of  A total of 40 patients with stable COPD of  After treatment, the VO Governor vessel moxibustion can effectively improve the cardiopulmonary fitness, clinical symptoms and the quality of life in patients with stable COPD of
